attributes.action: Leave his position as Prime Minister now and not replace him with the inept Gordon Brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair has now destroyed this country, he has lost the support of the majority of Labour supporters and has driven many voters away from them. Tony Blair needs to resign with immediate effect however he should not be replaced by the perhaps even worse Gordon Brown. Tony, you have made this country the laughing stock of the world.....GO NOW

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
